Port.name: In
Port.description: Recieve the current location of the robot.(ie. Grid[5][6] is represented by 56.0.)

Port.name: Out
Port.description: Send the variation(0 to 1 means becoming impassable) of the grid.(ie. Grid[3][7] is represented by 37.0.)

Model.name: Robot
Model.description: It receives variation from the sensor, and update its map, and move to a random grid next to it(up,down,left or right), going nowhere if all adjacent grids is impassable.

Port.name: Out
Port.description: Send the current location of the robot to sensor.

Model.name: Cell
Model.description: It receives variation from the sensor, and update its map, and move to a random grid next to it(up,down,left or right), going nowhere if all adjencent grids is impassable.
